page.title: 02Village Review- Whitehills
page.content: The {Harbour and Fish Market,}which auctions daily at 8 a.m. is served by 18 local fishing vessels, ranging from Crabbers, (2 men, 18 feet) to Pair Trawlers, (8 men, 60 feet). Whitehills has the usual {village amenities,} grocery shops, butcher, baker, newsagent, electrician, part-time library and bank branches (Clydesdale & North of Scotland) opening Monday and Friday mornings. There is a new semi-open-plan {Primary School, }providing full-time education for 120 children and a morning{Nursery for under-5s }as well as serving as a centre for community activities The{Harbour and Fish Market}attract many tourists and just beyond is a well-equipped children's & adults' recreation area run by Whitehills & District Playing Field Association.
